column2: editor and educator. A member of [[The Tolkien Society]] in the early 1990s
column3: he founded what is now known as [[Imladris
column5: Danmarks Tolkienforening) together with [[Inge Søbæk]] in 1993.

column1: He also became the editor for ''[[Athelas (journal)|Athelas]]''
column2: the journal of the Society. As the [[The Lord of the Rings Appendices|Appendices]] were not included in the Danish edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
column3: Lysemose published a translation running through several issues of ''Athelas''.

column2: Lysemose moved to the United States and left the post as editor for ''Athelas''.
